code:
flowchart TD

    A[HTTP Request Received] --> B[Public Index.php]

    B --> C[CodeIgniter Bootstraps Framework]

    C --> D[Routing Determines Controller and Method]

    D --> E[Controller Instantiated]

    E --> F[Controller Loads Models and Services]

    F --> G[Controller Processes Request Logic]

    G --> H[Prepare Data Array for View]

    H --> I[Render View via Mustache Engine]

    I --> J[Send Final Response to Browser]
repo_description: This project is now using CodeIgniter 4 as its framework.
